page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content: IN{COUNTRYSIDE AREAS LIKE CREICH}AND {MOONZIE,}LIFE STYLES DIFFER SIGNIFICANTLY FROM THOSE OF THE TOWN OR CITY_DWELLER.THE PRINCIPAL DIFFERENCE IS BECAUSE OF TOPOGRAPHY OF THE AREA;THE NEAREST TOWN IS 7\KM. DISTANT,WHICH NECESSITATES THE DAILY USE OF SOME FORM OF TRANSPORT FOR THOSE (THE MAJORITY OF WORKERS) WHO DO NOT WORK LOCALLY.HOUSEWIVES HAVE TO PLAN THEIR MEALS WELL IN ADVANCE,SINCE THERE ARE NO LOCAL SHOPS,EXCEPT FOR MOBILE SHOPS SELLING MEAT,FISH, GROCERIES AND BAKERY GOODS WHICH CALL TWICE WEEKLY.BECAUSE THE HOUSES ARE WIDELY SCATTERED,VILLAGE HALL ENTERTAINMENT IS USUALLY VERY WELL ATTENDED. MOST PEOPLE WATCH TV AND LISTEN TO THE RADIO.THERE IS A VILLAGE COMMUNITY COUNCIL DEALING WITH PROBLEMS CONCERNING THE UPKEEP AND MAINTENANCE OF THE VILLAGE.
